message.body: Hey I'm in LA and staying in Silver Lake. What day is your opening again? ####
Hey ##### Welcome to LA. Silverlake is pretty hip. The show at Regen Projects opens on Sat. 6-8pm.
Great, I am coordinating schedules with a few people here so we will do my best to make it to the opening . Hope to see u soon buddy

I got your voice mail. Can we meet up tomorrow night for drinks? I'm actually staying right next to dodgers stadium in salano canyon. We could meet up anywhere u think would be best, what do you think?
Tomorrow sounds great. I'll do some research. I should be off work at 6pm, so we could meet at 6:30-7.
Great! I'm still getting adjusted to how people get around this city.
Unless it's like 3am and you have a car.
